sample_docs: Docs Overview Overview Let's discover Nialabs APIS in less than 5 minutes . Getting Started - Biometric Web Api V1 Nialabs Engine Top Level De tegration is simple Receiving realtime data from nialabs server is very easy to integrate. You just need to enable a POST url on your server on which our server will send realtime push data. What you'll need Your cloud server webhook(callback) url On this url nialabs server will send push data. Nialabs portal After purchasing the devices / or apis you will be given credentials of our APIS monitor portal. Types of APIS Callback API Punch data and other events pushed to your server(on callback url) realtime. Management API Your server will call nialabs api to add / update data on device and manage device states. Format of Apis every request originating either from your server or from nialabs server contains two types of data. one is query params. i.e. stgid=xxxx , where xxxx is the service tag number or serial number of the device. other is post data. which contains the data of the punch / user / device Following is the format of the data pushed in body section of the http request. All the request must be in the specified format { [ "operation" ] : { [ "operationType" ] : { "operationData" } , "OperationID" : "string" , "AuthToken" : "string" , } } operation : the type of request operation. i.e. Realtime / Add / Load / Delete and so on. operationType : specified the type of the operation i.e. User / Photo / Template and so on. operationData : the actual data of the operation required to perform the logic. the format varies based on the operation and operation type. OperationID : the unique operation id for the operation. AuthToken : (optional) required to validate the authenticity of the request. Getting Started - Biometric Web Api V1 Nialabs Engine Top Level Design Receiving realtime data from nialabs server is very easy to integrate. You just need to enable a POST url on your server on which our server will send realtime push data. Your cloud server webhook(callback) url On this url nialabs server will send push data. After purchasing the devices / or apis you will be given credentials of our APIS monitor portal. Punch data and other events pushed to your server(on callback url) realtime. Your server will call nialabs api to add / update data on device and manage device states. every request originating either from your server or from nialabs server contains two types of data. one is query params. i.e. stgid=xxxx , where xxxx is the service tag number or serial number of the device. other is post data. which contains the data of the punch / user / device Following is the format of the data pushed in body section of the http request. All the request must be in the specified format operation : the type of request operation. i.e. Realtime / Add / Load / Delete and so on. operationType : specified the type of the operation i.e. User / Photo / Template and so on. operationData : the actual data of the operation required to perform the logic. the format varies based on the operation and operation type. OperationID : the unique operation id for the operation. AuthToken : (optional) required to validate the authenticity of the request.

Login Modal : Availability : Available Availability : Available Frequently Asked Questions Nialabs specializes in AI-powered biometric device solutions that transform workforce management through advanced cloud connectivity. With expertise in AI-powered technologies, Nialabs offers a Biometric Device API, a Biometric Attendance API, and advanced biometric systems that enhance security, streamline operations, and improve efficiency across industries. A biometric device is a security tool that uses biological characteristics, such as fingerprints or facial features, to identify or recognize a person's identity. These devices are typically used for purposes like attendance tracking and access control to secure sensitive areas. Nialabs offers a wide range of biometric devices, including thumb attendance machines, dynamic face recognition terminals, and biometric devices empowered by AI and cloud APIs. Our biometric solutions are scalable and capable of catering to businesses of all shapes and sizes. Absolutely, the cloud APIs and biometric solutions at Nialabs are designed to ensure seamless integration. Effortlessly connect your biometric devices with existing HRM systems, payroll systems, and ERP solutions using our biometric attendance API. This creates a unified ecosystem providing real-time updates and helps manage attendance, access control, and workforce data. With AI-driven biometric identification, end-to-end encryption, and multi-factor authentication, security is at the core of our technology. Our solutions empower you with features like real-time biometric login monitoring and customizable access to ensure that you are always in control. Nialabs offers versatile biometric solutions that can cater to the needs of businesses across multiple industries, including healthcare, manufacturing, corporate enterprises, education, etc. Any organization, regardless of its scale or strength, that requires accurate attendance tracking, secure access control, and streamlined workforce operations can benefit from our advanced biometric API solutions. Yes, Nialabs leverages real-time biometric software to provide instant updates regarding attendance, access logs, and workforce data. Moreover, our cloud API gives regular updates about the active status of biometric devices. With real-time updates, you can be on top of everything and make better decisions with accurate and up-to-date information. Absolutely! We offer modular and scalable solutions integrated through cloud APIs designed to grow with your business. Whether you're adding devices or expanding on locations or features, the same API can connect all the devices and meet the changing demands of your growing business. The biometric device cost depends on various factors, such as the number of thumb machines, features, and integration required. At Nialabs, we offer cost-effective biometric device solutions crafted to meet your needs and ensure you get your hands on premium technology. Plus, our web API can integrate with your existing biometric devices so you won't have to pay anything extra. The future of biometrics lies in enhanced security, improved user experience, adoption of contactless systems, AI-driven solutions, and deeper integration with cloud API technologies. As a leader in biometric solutions, Nialabs is at the forefront of this evolution, constantly evolving to meet the biometric needs across India. Login AI Face Biometric Device APIS Transforming Workforce Management with Cloud-Connected API Biometric Device Solutions Experience biometric technology with our AI-enabled fingerprint scanner and face recognition devices . These solutions, seamlessly integrated through biometric device APIs and Cloud APIs , deliver advanced security, real-time efficiency, and effortless connectivity About Nialabs At Nialabs, we lead in cloud-based biometric devices solutions, transforming operations, security, and connectivity to redefine the workplace experience. Our API supports all kinds of biometric devices , from access control systems and attendance tracking to biometric scanners and face recognition devices . With the AI-powered Biometric fingerprint API, Biometric Online SDK , and Biometric Attendance API , we enable seamless integration with your existing management systems. Elevate your security standards with NiaLabs—where innovation meets precision Why Choose Nialabs for Biometric Device Solutions? We're pushing the envelope of security and connectivity by combining innovation with expertise to offer a state-of-the-art biometric device API for businesses of all spaces and sectors. Here's how we stand out with our industry-leading finger and face biometric devices and solutions: Cloud API Integration Embrace the power of the cloud to connect your devices securely and reliably. Our cloud-connected API enables real-time biometrics login and data exchange, remote monitoring, and seamless firmware updates, keeping your devices up-to-date and future-proof. Data Analytics & Insights With our biometric attendance API, turn workforce data into actionable insights with our advanced analytics and reporting tools. The real-time dashboard and predictive analysis will help you fill the gaps in the performance and make informed decisions to drive your business forward. Scalability & Flexibility Nialabs offers modular biometric solutions that are designed to grow with your business. Whether you're a small startup or an established business, our biometric device API can be seamlessly integrated regardless of the biometric hardware and number of machines in your premises. Precision and Security Precision is at the heart of our biometric API solutions. We utilize advanced AI-powered devices and cloud-connected APIs that provide secure and accurate real-time access. Access Control System With our push-based API, you can stay updated about real-time biometric login, and manage access easily. Effective Workforce Management Our biometric device API sends real-time updates and integrates with your existing HR management systems. Contact us now to discuss your requirements, and we'll deliver biometric device API solutions customized to your business's specific needs. What Sets Our Advanced Biometric API Solutions Apart? Multi Model Biometric Solutions Our biometric device range offers versatile options, including biometric thumb machines and face recognition terminals empowered by AI and cloud software. Coupled with an online API for biometric devices, our solutions ensure the flexibility to serve the diverse needs of your business.. Seamless Integration Effortlessly connect with your existing HRM, payroll, or ERP platforms using a biometric attendance API and enjoy real-time updates without any hassle. This seamless integration creates a unified system that improves efficiency and simplifies workforce management. Contactless And Hygienic Solutions Prioritize workplace safety with APIs that power contactless solutions such as one-touch finger biometric machines, face recognition, QR codes, and RFID card access. These technologies reduce physical contact and ensure hygienic operations without compromising security. Cost Effective Solutions By leveraging cloud APIs, our solutions minimize the need for extensive hardware, offering a budget-friendly approach to advanced biometrics. Our cloud API can be integrated with all kinds of biometric hardware, including biometric devices from eSSL, ZKTeco, and Identix, making it more effective, convenient, and cost-effective. Robust Support We have a dedicated team of experienced professionals to assist you through installation, troubleshooting, and ongoing support and maintenance. Our proven expertise and unparalleled support continue to set high standards in the biometrics and cloud industry. Get the Best of Biometric Devices with Nialabs With Nialabs, you're not just choosing India's best AI-powered biometric solution—you're investing in a future where technology works seamlessly to support your goals and objectives. Through cutting-edge biometric devices and cloud-connected APIs, our solutions empower businesses of all sizes to maximize the potential of their devices effortlessly. Login Biometric Attendance System and Machines - Secure, Fast & Reliable Nialabs offers advanced biometric attendance systems to simplify school and staff management and boost security for modern businesses. Fingerprint Time Attendance & Access Control System - N20 The N20 is a smart and reliable fingerprint biometric device designed for efficient employee attendance tracking. It features a 2.4-inch TFT LCD display and offers a user-friendly interface and multiple verification modes, including fingerprint, PIN, and optional ID/MIFARE card support. The smart device is capable of storing 3,000 fingerprints and 200,000 attendance records, making it suitable for businesses of all sizes. Moreover, it is enhanced with a biometric API that provides cloud integration along with other connectivity options, ensuring hassle-free data management. With fast processing, durable build quality, and scalable storage capacity, the N20 is a versatile and robust solution for modern attendance management. Face, Fingerprint Time Attendance and Access Control System - N-AI07 The N-AI07F Dynamic Face & Fingerprint Recognition Terminal is an advanced dual identification access control and attendance management system. This device combines high-precision fingerprint authentication with AI-powered face recognition to ensure accurate and reliable identification. With mask detection, anti-spoofing, and multiple authentication modes, including face, fingerprint, QR code, and RFID card, the N-AI07F offers top-notch security and flexibility. This convenience is further enhanced with the user-friendly interface and support for a biometric API. The N-AI07F promises real-time monitoring, remote access control, and cloud connectivity for effortless integration and management. With dual identification, smart features, and an option to expand user capacity, the N-AI07F is an ideal choice for businesses of all sizes. Face Time Attendance & Access Control Reader - N-AI06 The N-AI06 is an advanced access control and attendance face recognition terminal powered by AI-based face recognition technology. It features a high-resolution display and an easy-to-navigate interface and ensures fast and accurate identification with mask detection and anti-spoofing protection. Equipped with a biometric API, the N-AI06 facilitates remote access control, real-time monitoring, and cloud connectivity. With multiple authentication modes such as face recognition, QR code, and RFID card, it adapts to various security needs. Furthermore, the strong build and large user capacity make N-AI06 a smart and dependable face recognition device. Face Recognition Time Attendance & Access Control System - AI05 The AI05 Biometric Terminal is a smart and adaptable solution for access management and employee attendance tracking. Equipped with AI-powered technology and cloud-based software, it allows real-time monitoring and remote system control with ease. Moreover, with features like infrared live body detection, intuitive interface, and intelligent recognition algorithms, it can adjust to varying lighting and facial changes, ensuring consistent accuracy. Packed with a powerful processor and built-in battery, the smart terminal guarantees fast, uninterrupted operation even during power outages. The strong build, flexible mounting, and multiple connectivity options make it a secure and dependable solution for high-traffic areas.
